functional_language.code:
val numbers = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
val doubled = numbers.map { it * 2 }

object_oriented_language.code: class Person(val name: String, val age: Int)

compiled_language.code: // Kotlin compiles to JVM bytecode or native code
compiled_language.comment: Kotlin is compiled to JVM bytecode, JavaScript, or native binaries

general_purpose_language.code: // Kotlin can be used for Android, web, server-side, desktop, etc.

automatic_management.comment: Memory is managed automatically by the JVM garbage collector

third_generation.code: // Kotlin is a modern third-generation language

script_file.comment: Kotlin scripts (.kts files) execute from top to bottom

single_line.code: // This is a single line comment

special.code:
//TODO: Implement this feature
//FIXME: Bug in this code
special.comment: Kotlin recognizes TODO, FIXME and other special comment markers

standard_libraries.comment: Kotlin has extensive standard library available without external dependencies

extensive_frameworks.comment: Kotlin uses Gradle or Maven for dependency management
